meanings: (말·충고 등을) listen (to), follow, obey, take (one's advice), (Am) mind, (formal) heed
(효과가 있다) have an effect (on), be effective, work (for), act (on)

examples.korean: She looked at the recumbent form beside her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자기 옆에 있는 드러 누워 있는 형상을 바라 보았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Bill Drummond's No Music Day has a following that has admirable intentions, but that doesn't stop it from being a bit of a hoax. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 빌 드러몬드의 음악 없는 날은 칭찬할 만한 의도를 갖고 있지만 그것이 이 행사가 장난으로 끝나는 것을 막지는 못한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Bill Drummond's No Music Day has a following that has admirable intentions, but that doesn't stop it from being a bit of a hoax. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Drummond and the supporters of No Music Day have effectively hit upon a sensitive nerve in today's electronic, high-tech, gadget-dependant society. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 드러몬드와 음악 없는 날의 지지자들은 오늘날의 전자, 최첨단 기술, 기계 장치에 의존하는 사회에서 민감한 신경을 효과적으로 건드렸다. Neungyule
examples.english: Drummond and the supporters of No Music Day have effectively hit upon a sensitive nerve in today's electronic, high-tech, gadget-dependant society. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It's true that Drummond's No Music Day is a tad off center, but the crusaders are on the right track in insisting that too much technology and the over-ability of sound or background music is pushing us further apart from ourselves and one another. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 드러몬드의 음악 없는 날이 중심에서 벗어난 것은 분명하지만 이런 일을 벌이는 사람들이 너무 과도한 기술과 지나친 소리, 배경음악이 우리로 하여금 우리 자신과 서로에게서 더 멀어지게 한다고 주장하는 것은 옳은 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: It's true that Drummond's No Music Day is a tad off center, but the crusaders are on the right track in insisting that too much technology and the over-ability of sound or background music is pushing us further apart from ourselves and one another. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I've got in bed in a lot of pain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 심한 통증으로 드러 누워 있다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 왕눈이(yuna****)
examples.english: I've got in bed in a lot of pain. Add to Wordbook
